name: The Neptune Records
description:
The Neptune Records - A Folded Reality 

Welcome on Titon, Neptune's moon. You play as a private detective tasked with finding a dangerous individual who has broken the Material Taboo. To find him, you've been authorized to break the World's Veil, to manipulate reality. As such, you'll be able to modify the game's file in your own explorer.
A puzzle game, you'll have to use your imagination to modify, create and delete game files as to unravel the mysteries of the City of the Immortals, find your target and bring the swift hammer of justice upon him !

-=- Controls -=-

ZQSD or directional keys for 2D movement.
E for action.

-=- Trailer -=- -=- Team -=-

A end-of-year project made by students of Télécom Sudparis and ENSIIE :

Prométhée "Akasuna" TONEATTI
Hugo "Kohuro" CARBIENER
Pierre "PtiBouchon" POLLET
Henri "Biscuit Prime" NOMICO
ElRaphik
